item.description:
Sandy Koufax, Hank Greenberg, and 158 other "first-string Major League" baseball players happen to have been Jewish - this is the story of them, their fans, and baseball fans everywhere.  91 minutes, plus the four-minute animated short "God & Co."

 

These are part of the annual Hartford Jewish Film Festival.  A number of the films will be posted, if you're interested in the full schedule look here:  http://www.hjff.org/schedule.shtml

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Jews and Baseball: An American Love Story" (Hartford Jewish Film Festival)
